title: Major retailers say no to hoverboard sales for this holiday season
text:
Major retailers say no to hoverboard sales for this holiday season 
Published By: BGR.com - Today 
Hoverboards, which self-balancing Segway-like scooters that donâ€™t levitate are known as, are one of the hottest new products of the year. ...
